ygData.subject: Re: Rune Sword
ygData.msgSnippet: Petitions seem to take 20 minutes to 45 minutes to be answered depending on the time of day.  If you log off before it is answered the petition is deleted ...
ygData.messageBody:
Petitions seem to take 20 minutes to 45 minutes to be answered depending on
the time of day. If you log off before it is answered the petition is
deleted

-----Original Message-----
From: Elena Glenn <braveheart@...>
To: warriors_eq@onelist.com <warriors_eq@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, June 09, 1999 1:42 PM
Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Rune Sword


>From: "Elena Glenn" <braveheart@...>
>
>Hmmm. Wonder if it could be a glitch in that zone, then. I think I will
do
>a petition anyway, although I have yet to have anyone answer one.
>
>Leri
>-----Original Message-----
>From: John Merkle <rjak@...>
>To: warriors_eq@onelist.com <warriors_eq@onelist.com>
>Date: Wednesday, June 09, 1999 10:11 AM
>Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Rune Sword
>
>

>>with my corpse
